summary: This is an email from an Associate U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a monthly unit update report, likely related to the Epstein case investigation or prosecution activities.

persons.role: Sender of the email and report

keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 4, 2019, from an Associate U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email transmits a monthly unit update report, suggesting ongoing case-related activities.
The document originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office handling the Epstein case prosecution.
